name: The Woods (itch) (Duckiequackers)
description:
A wave-based survival horror shooter.

Defend your cabin in the woods from all manner of evil entities attempting to snuff you out! Use various weapons and traps to fortify your house while slaying waves on oncoming spirits!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left mouse - Shoot

Q - Heal

E - Place traps

F - Interact

Scroll wheel - switch weapons

This is a game made by a group of 4 students attending Full Sail University as part of our degree program
